insert into advertisement (user_id, is_textbook, tag_id, image_ids, price, `comment`, number_of_taps, create_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isTextbook,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tagId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{imageIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberOfTaps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update advertisement set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_textbook = #{isTextbook,jdbcType=BIT}, tag_id = #{tagId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, image_ids = #{imageIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, `comment` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number_of_taps = #{numberOfTaps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, is_textbook, tag_id, image_ids, price, `comment`, number_of_taps, create_time from advertisement where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_id, is_textbook, tag_id, image_ids, price, `comment`, number_of_taps, create_time from advertisement
